text: The Centre de services scolaire de Sorel-Tracy is a school service centre that serves 5 francophone school districts in the Canadian province of Quebec. It comprises several primary schools and high schools across municipalities in the Montérégie region. The commission is overseen by a board of elected school trustees. ==External links== ==References== Category:School districts in Quebec Category:Education in Montérégie Category:School service centre
title: Centre de services scolaire de Sorel-Tracy
